name: Fan Service
description:
An ultracasual endless runner for android phones

Fan Service is a very simple endless runner that I made to practice the Android release pipeline as well as improve my own artwork and animation process. I have never created 2d animated assets apart from pixel sprites so it was a great learning experience. I went with a pretty adolescent art 'style' as the focus was more on completion and the entire pipeline opposed to minor details. 

Feedback as always is welcome!
